discourse_list.title: Optimism Dai Bridge with Fast Withdrawals

content.content: Was the Fast Withdrawals feature ever launched?

To avoid these problems of waiting for someone, I look for alternatives.    xPollinate | Cross-Chain Transfer    xPollinate | Cross-Chain Transfer Transfer token between chains using NXTP      I use it regularly to move my DAI from FTM to BSC and optimism.

It’s called DAI Wormhole now. It will be used also for L2 → L2 teleporting. The launch date is the end of Q1 for L2->L1 wormholes (fast withdrawals).     Introducing Maker Wormhole Protocol Engineering   [maker-wormhole-logo] Introduction Maker’s Protocol Engineering Core Unit is building upon its multichain strategy by introducing DAI Wormholing - the ability for almost instant teleportation of DAI between supported Layer 2s + Ethereum.  As the Layer 2 ecosystem evolves and DAI liquidity grows within these domains, it will become important for users to be able to move DAI between them in a trustless manner. This initiative to Wormhole DAI across Layer 2 ecosystems, starting with Optimism and…
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
